resources.string: We can only win together! You will learn about the health of others if you anonymously tell about yours. Ðžne rule for everyone.
We can only win together! You will learn about the health of others if you anonymously tell about yours.
Please mark the symptoms that you noticed in yourself
mark if you feel something similar
don\'t mark if you don\'t feel it
Avoid crowded places. Use a face shield and wash your hands. Send us your health information. See your doctor right away if you have the first signs of illness.
Avoid crowded places. Use a face shield and wash your hands. Send us your health information.
Please mark the symptoms that you noticed in yourself
mark if you feel something similar
don\'t mark if you don\'t feel it
You have been close to people who have symptoms of the disease. Seek medical advice immediately. After visiting the doctor, tell us how you feel.
You have been close to people who have symptoms of the disease. Seek medical advice and tell us how you feel.
If tests confirmed that you are sick check the box
mark if tests confirmed that you are sick
don\'t mark if you are healthy
Attention! The "Sick" status can be changed only after 14 days!
Everything will be fine. Recover. Follow the advice of doctors. Let us know when you are healthy.
Everything will be fine. Recover Follow the advice of doctors. Let us know when you are healthy.
If tests confirmed that you are healthy check the box
mark if tests confirmed that you are healthy
don\'t mark if you are still sick
Please let us know about your health via:
You have a high body temperature
Shortness of breath and breathing difficulties
Share this app. Together we will win
Tests confirmed that you are sick
Tests confirmed that you are healthy
For a better experience, turn on necessary services
The virus is transmitted from person to person. Hundreds of people pass us every day. Are any of them sick yet? How to avoid dangerous contacts? How to save life and health?
Find out how many times people with signs of the disease have been near you. Track how many of these people are near you. Help stop the spread of the disease.
If somewhere around you there is a person showing signs of disease, the app will notify you.
Take an anonymous test for symptoms of the disease and get the opportunity to stay healthy and avoid dangerous contacts. Ten seconds of your time can save more than one life.

It is necessary for everyone to share their health anonymously. Then others will be able to protect themselves, avoid dangerous contacts or consult with doctor in time. Only this way, only together, will we stop the disease.
Near you are people with poor health
It\'s time to check your health
Start the tracing of close contacts
